text_block_list.name: Palmer's Friend
text_block_list.text:
Aah～ thank you, Palmer! Consulting with you 
was the right choice! I really appreciate it!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Really? Though, there's only so much I can do, y'know. 
But if you want a chat, I'm here to listen anytime, 'kay?

text_block_list.name: Palmer's Friend
text_block_list.text:
Waaaah, Palmer, you're so sweet～! 
I'm seriously so jealous of your Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha… but why'd you put it like that? 
Don't you mean you wish you had my trainer…?

text_block_list.name: Palmer's Friend
text_block_list.text:
'Cause, you know～ You're always up to listen and help out. 
I'm way jealous of them～!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Eeehh? Haha, I don't know about that…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: (Jealous, huh……)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
(But in reality, it's different. Trainer is the one 
who supports and helps me out all the time.)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
… The atmosphere here is totally different from official races. 
So this is what freestyle's like……!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Wow… this is kinda amazing. 
I feel so… fired up, just by watching…!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
(If Trainer hadn't encouraged me to participate 
back then, I might have been content with just 
watching and gone back.)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: ……! Yeah… yeah, I'll give it a try!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
(Now I'm able to enjoy myself and run to my heart's content… 
It's all thanks to Trainer giving me that opportunity.)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: … But she's jealous because of me? Haha, no way. I'm thankful for just having Trainer willing to stick by my side.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Really, all I can do is listen, you know…?

On the way back from visiting bookstores 
in search of resources that might be useful 
for Mejiro Palmer's training ——

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Trainer! What a coincidence! Did you go shopping? 
Let's head back together.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
… Wait a sec. That's a ton of bags! 
Come, come, give me some, let me help. 
Look, your hands are getting all red!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Haha, holding back now? It's a little bit too late for… wait, 
are all of these books?! Why did you get so many? 
Were they not available at the library…?

While the school library is well stocked, there's still 
some unique resources that only bookstores offer.

I continued to explain that even seemingly unrelated content 
at first glance can be utilized in training with clever thinking.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: That's why you went through this trouble…?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
(…… You're such a serious, hard worker. Always putting in so 
much effort and approaching the job with utmost sincerity.)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
(Because of your strong sense of individuality, you remain 
unfazed even when other trainers make comments.)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: (—— Back then…)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Ooh～ That was a mighty big sigh!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Ahahah! Sorry, did I startle you? I was taking a nap over there 
in the shade, but I couldn't help being curious.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
So, something making you feel down? Wanna tell me about it? 
Just putting it into words can make you feel better.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
(You were feeling so down from missing 
a scouting opportunity…)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
(Now you're diligently carrying out your role and responsibilities 
as a trainer with a horsegirl under your wing.)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Good work, Trainer. 
It must be a difficult job, hey? Being a trainer?

I told her that it's just like how she sprints with all her might 
and laughs through the tough parts, finding joy in it all. 
This joy is irreplaceable to me. And that's why ——
choice_data_list: I'm glad that I get to be your trainer.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Hey, that's what I wanna say!! 
Haha… thanks, though!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
But, you shouldn't overdo it, you know. 
Are you making sure to eat properly? Taking breaks?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Ahaha. You're good then!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
(But Trainer…… you seem to have developed 
some slight dark circles under your eyes.)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: (I understand that it's tough but enjoyable. I get it, but still…)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
(… Hmm, yeah… for some reason 
I can't quite seem to believe you.)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: (I know you're not lying about being glad to be my trainer, but…)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: (I don't know, something doesn't quite feel right.… hmm～?)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
… Oh, umm… H-How about we head back soon! 
I'm getting hungry!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
(… Alright! At the very least, let me try not be a burden! 
I'll do anything I can! Yeah.)

Mejiro Palmer snatches the bags I was holding from my hand 
and walks briskly ahead. Upon expressing my gratitude, she 
smiles and matches her pace with mine.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Hey, what kind of books did you buy? If there's anything related 
to training prep or something else I can help with, let me know!

I responded in affirmation. But as long as Mejiro Palmer 
can be herself, that's all that matters to me.

To ensure this gentle, kind-hearted girl can 
run according to her true self, I must put in 
even more effort — such were my thoughts.
